name: Love Fishing !
description:
Love-Fishing free version Game designed for everyone who love sea Fishing.

Designed:
• Friendly and easily screen with Shark.
• 3 Kind Fish: mini, small and Large with color.
• 100% free

Playing:
• Easy to Fishing by ''Shake'' device up as you real Fishing
• Can Fishing by Tape on Screen

Other:
• Support maximum 20 Health (Fish) each new Game. Add more Health when susscess Fishing.
• Natural scene and real Sound
• Future supports more other kind of Fish
